body_html:
Addressed most of the comments. Major revision includes:

  • Use positional input/output binding
  • More efficient algorithm for figuring out boundary inputs

The only remaining major issue is whether we should error out when batch size is larger than max batch size. I'll collect some numbers and see.

body:
Addressed most of the comments. Major revision includes:
- Use positional input/output binding
- More efficient algorithm for figuring out boundary inputs

The only remaining major issue is whether we should error out when batch size is larger than max batch size. I'll collect some numbers and see.
